articleinfo.title: How can I use Rosetta to translate my project

sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para:
This document covers all steps needed to follow so you get a new resource to translate imported into Rosetta. It does not cover the steps to translate Ubuntu resources, if you have any special request or question about Ubuntu translations, please, send it directly to
Ubuntu translators mailing list.

sect1.title: Creating a new Product in Launchpad
sect1.para:
To be able to translate anything with Rosetta you need first a product in Launchpad. There are already many products created already in Launchpad, so the first step is check if it already exists. To do it go to the Product Search form and try to find the product you are interested on.
